ground_truth_reviews.comment: This test is not self-contained and is now flaky. It relies on other tests to populate the database with posts before it runs, which is not a reliable testing strategy as test execution order is not guaranteed. A test should always set up its own required state. To fix this, you should create the necessary post(s) within this test function before making the assertion.

title: refactor: Simplify post retrieval test
body: Removed redundant post creation from `test_get_all_posts` since other tests already create posts, which should ensure the database isn't empty when this test runs.
